con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Gets the claim summary information for the claim number provided Gets the claim summary information for the claim number provided

con:parameter.con:name: policyId
con:parameter.con:description: the policy number of the policy to which the claim which is being requested is associated

con:parameter.con:name: claimId
con:parameter.con:description: the uniue id of the claim which is being requested

con:method.name: PUT
con:method.con:description: Adds a new Claim on the policy Adds a new Claim on the policy

con:parameter.con:description: the policy number of the policy to which the claim which is being requested is associated

con:parameter.con:description: the policy number of the policy to which the claim which is being requested is associated
